feed.title: Manyfold Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.78.1
entry.content:
Minor bugfix for incorrect file paths being created during upload.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix error with file paths in uploaded models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2670

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Update README.md by @pedroma in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2667

New Contributors

  • @pedroma made their first contribution in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2667

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.78.0...v0.78.1

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.79.0
entry.content:
This release sees the arrival of a long-awaited feature, the ability to upload files into an existing model! Now you can add images, extra files, fixed files, whatever you want. It also comes with improved upload performance, and a load of bugfixes for some issues that have been on the backlog for a long time!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Upload files into existing models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2686
  • Add file type icon to blank previews by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2685

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Link tags on model page to list by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2676
  • Redirect back to edit page after using new creator/collection button by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2677
  • Make "problem" links dark to fix contrast issues. by @aneurinprice in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2679
  • Fix invisible tag selector border by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2684
  • Fix library storage key lookup by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2691
  • Remove overflowing text on image carousel buttons by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2692
  • Fix bulk actions in advanced admin interface by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2693
  • Send logs to stdout by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2694
  • Fix redirection when viewing a page that requires login by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2697
  • Make sure tag ordering is consistent by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2698
  • Fix upload problems caused by Shrine config by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2703

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Improve performance and disk usage during upload processing by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2674

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.78.1...v0.79.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.80.0
entry.content:
This release is all about bugs! Along with v0.79.0, it includes fixes for every high-priority bug we wanted to fix for v1.0.0. A lot of these have been around for a long time, so it's great to get them closed!

Having said that though, there are a few new features too. First of all, we have a Spanish translation thanks to some fantastic work by @juanjomurga! Also, you can now use Markdown in model descriptions (used to be notes), and they're displayed under the image carousel in your models, just like you'd expect on any other model hosting site. Manyfold will also raise problems for missing metadata, like links, creators, tags, or license. To enable those, change them from "ignored" to "info" in settings. We knew there would be a lot, so we left them hidden by default üòÑ

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Markdown support for note fields by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2705
  • Rename model notes to description, and move to under images by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2707
  • Raise problems for missing metadata (license, creator, tags, links) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2750
  • Add Spanish translation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2769

üîí Security üîí

  • Check that library paths are safe and writable upon creation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2729

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Hide empty titles by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2714
  • Disallow model deletion if it contains other models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2719
  • Don't rescan thingiverse folders with incorrect files by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2720
  • Fix error in model policy check by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2724
  • Hide empty notes fields by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2726
  • Fix error after model edit/reorganise failure by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2727
  • Use correct regexp method in mysql for tag list by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2741
  • Fix public ID lookup in admin interface by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2742
  • Make object ordering case insensitive by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2751
  • Fix upload confusion by only uploading on form submit by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2753
  • Fix disabled upload button on model page by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2754
  • "order" parameter should not be in filter list by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2756
  • Merge incorrectly duplicated roles by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2755
  • Fix error when showing nested collections by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2757
  • Fix error after "new creator" from model edit by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2758
  • Remove default scopes to avoid errors on PostgreSQL by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2759
  • Fix lowercase sorting error on Postgres by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2770
  • Fix error thrown when editing creators or collections by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2771

üåç Sustainability & Performance üåç

  • Reduce SQLite busy errors by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2723
  • Use BEGIN TRANSACTION IMMEDIATE in SQLite by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2728

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Link to markdown help next to notes fields by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2706
  • Use GitHub discussions for support by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2711
  • Update to Uppy version 4 by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2718
  • Make activejob status code more defensive by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2725
  • More careful titleization by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2731
  • DRY up model lookup from URL parameters by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2736
  • Automatically recheck model problems after uploading by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2738
  • Update to NodeJS 20.15 by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2739
  • Update to Yarn 3.8 by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2740
  • Minor translation updates by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2768

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.79.0...v0.80.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.80.1
entry.content:
Quick bugfix for an error when creating new libraries using the suggested path.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix library path safety check by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2787

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.80.0...v0.80.1

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.81.0
entry.content:
There's a lot of work in this release, but perhaps not much is too visible. We're working on ActivityPub interoperability with platforms like Mastodon, and there's a lot of work under the hood to get us there. The visible ActivityPub interaction stuff is very near though, hopefully you'll get to see it within a week in v0.82.0!

This release does have a few bug fixes though, and a new feature whereby you can split a model's files into two parts through the bulk file editor. So, if you merged things by accident, now you can undo it!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Split selected files into new model when bulk editing by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2864
  • Improve social previews by description and image, and improving title by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2870
  • Make ActivityPub messages Mastodon-compatible with HTTP signatures by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2803
  • Working responses to ActivityPub follow requests from Mastodon servers by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2846
  • Automatically accept ActivityPub follow requests by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2833

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Use Rails's built-in health endpoint by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2792
  • Remove up-front keypair generation data task by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2802
  • Avoid creating duplicate problems by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2813
  • Fix backgrounded organize jobs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2814
  • Ignore SSL EOF errors from badly configured servers by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2835
  • Fix activity data migration by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2838
  • Fix error browsing collections with library filter by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2855
  • Fix search by removing preview_file preload by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2856
  • Fix bug with not extracting files from root of zipfile by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2857
  • Fixed another edge case in path stripping by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2863
  • fix actor UUID persistence by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2867
  • Fix missing tags when splitting a model by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2868
  • Fix error with image previews in social graph by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2871
  • Fix description meta tag by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2872
  • Fix image path in meta tags by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2873
  • Skip target fetch for new follow path by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2879

üåç Sustainability & Performance üåç

  • Organize models in background after editing by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2812

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Test that creators can be looked up by acct URI by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2791
  • Translation updates (DE, ES, PL) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2795
  • Enable japanese and portuguese on translation.io by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2798
  • Keypair management for ActivityPub actors by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2801
  • Use Mastodon-compatible actor types by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2808
  • Delay background jobs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2810
  • Update federails to get UUIDs for actor URLs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2866
  • Add remote follow support, so you can hit "follow" on other instances by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2875
  • Move remote follow route to standard path by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2877
  • Improve opengraph output by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2881

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.80.1...v0.81.0
